name: Terran Shields
desc: The ship's shields are raised near-instantly, but cost %s more flux to upkeep.
short: Instantly raises shields with large upkeep.

name: Terran Missiles
desc: Missiles used by most terran craft are actually more of a main weapon than a side weapon. As such, they're designed to be %s less damaging, but shove extra engines into the frame for %s extra speed, making them harder to be shot down before hitting.
short: Faster missiles at the cost of payload.

name: Regenerating Missiles
desc: Missiles used by most terran craft are actually more of a main weapon than a side weapon. As such, they're designed with a %s smaller payload, but can be created on-board easily and are %s faster in the air.
short: Infinite, faster missiles at the cost of damage.
